0128b756-29be-4fbe-9c71-210f5d48a6d1.description: ACE:L2 is a 5-day course that expands on ACE:L1, focusing on features and skills used daily within the Arista customer network. Candidates will be exposed to the Arista Universal Cloud Network (UCN) model for Layer 2 Leaf-Spine topologies, leveraging Multi-chassis Link Aggregation (MLAG) and Virtual-ARP (VARP). This architecture is then presented in the context of the Arista Campus Network, and will introduce Arista's WiFi and campus specific features such as Power over Ethernet (PoE).
0128b756-29be-4fbe-9c71-210f5d48a6d1.name: ACE: L2 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 2)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:L2 certification requires a 4-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

skills.name: Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

7a0c5d66-96a4-4c3b-b9c0-f227d4dbd89d.description: ACE:L3 is a 5-day course that is designed around Arista’s data-driven Cloud network architectures. Candidates will master core technologies found in most modern corporate networks today such as MultiProtocol Border Gateway Protocol (MP-BGP), Exterior BGP (eBGP) underlays, Ethernet Virtual Private Networks (EVPN), and Virtual Extensible LAN protocol (VXLAN). Additional topics include security, QoS, multicast, and Cognitive Campus.
7a0c5d66-96a4-4c3b-b9c0-f227d4dbd89d.name: ACE: L3 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 3)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:L3 certification requires a 4-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

skills.name: Broadcast, Unicast And Multicast Traffic Processing
Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

794c05eb-ae3e-4fd6-a6ea-02c2094ff089.description: ACE:L5 is a 5-day course designed to give network engineers, architects, and operations staff the needed skills, tools, and strategies to automate the Arista network infrastructure. This course focuses on CloudVision automation leveraging Ansible, Python, and other commonly used automation languages. Extensive practical workshops are used to solidify discussion concepts.
794c05eb-ae3e-4fd6-a6ea-02c2094ff089.name: ACE: L5 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 5)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:L5 certification requires a 4-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

skills.name: Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

6dbeb549-6587-4a1e-8aa2-3d8785fdb86c.description: ACSP:SDE-DC Bootcamp is a 5-day course designed to train partner professional services engineers on the skills required when deploying Arista Data Center solutions. The course provides an overview of the Arista PS framework and methodologies that our partners can adapt to fit their existing services. Modern Data Center technologies such as Leaf-Spine architectures, MP-BGP, EVPN, and VXLAN are a major focus of this course, while utilizing Arista’s CloudVision for management and automation.
6dbeb549-6587-4a1e-8aa2-3d8785fdb86c.name: ACSP-SDE-DC (Arista Certified Services Provider - Services Delivery Engineer - Data Center)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACSP:SDE-DC Bootcamp certification requires a 4-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom. Upon certification, the candidate will receive a certificate and digital badge for both ACE:L3 and ACSP:SDE-DC as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

skills.name: Broadcast, Unicast And Multicast Traffic Processing
Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

9a165c76-6908-4bb5-a948-88639cf775b5.description: ACE:L1 is a 5-day course providing foundational networking knowledge and skills from a modern perspective in Arista's EOS networking environment. Candidates progress through networking fundamental topics ranging from Ethernet, TCP/IP, and Routing & Switching to network design, based on modern Leaf-Spine architecture used in today’s Enterprise Data Center and Campus networks. Candidates are also introduced to network automation with Arista’s CloudVision solution.
9a165c76-6908-4bb5-a948-88639cf775b5.name: ACE: L1 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 1)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:L1 certification requires a 2-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

skills.name: ACE:L1 is best suited for individuals entering the network engineering field and looking to acquire the essential knowledge and skills applied to modern network infrastructure.
Configure And Verify Basic IPv6 Connectivity
Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

59272d3d-afd9-49bb-8027-b7bcf40e8a89.description: ACE:DMF Specialist is a 3-day course designed to establish sound understanding and technical proficiency required to deploy and operate the DANZ Monitoring Fabric, a next-generation network packet broker (NPB). This course demonstrates why telemetry, monitoring, and visibility are crucial for your networks, and explores how DMF enables pervasive network observability by providing real-time and historical insights into your physical, virtual, and container environments.
59272d3d-afd9-49bb-8027-b7bcf40e8a89.name: ACE:DMF Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of the ACE:DMF Specialist course, the candidate will receive a credential and digital badge as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

c3a0f106-0062-43de-9753-9e2e321bb497.description: ACE:NDR is a 2-day course designed to show current challenges security architects face with new and emerging threats and attacks. Malicious activities can be performed by individuals who have administrative access to systems and information using encryption to further compromise networks. Course candidates will gain a better understanding of challenges faced by legacy protection mechanisms and how Arista’s NDR adds additional information and understanding about network traffic.
c3a0f106-0062-43de-9753-9e2e321bb497.name: ACE:NDR (Arista Cloud Engineer: Network Detection and Response)

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of the ACE:NDR course, the candidate will receive a credential and digital badge as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

edff785e-e6c4-402b-88e1-cf46d251ab39.description: ACE:L4 is a 5-day course focused on the Enterprise edge, Service Provider WAN, Large Enterprise Transport networks, and Data Center Interconnect (DCI) architectures. Candidates will explore the advanced routing capabilities available within Arista hardware and EOS. Topics such as EVPN, MPLS and Segment Routing will be discussed in depth. All topics are taught from both command line and CloudVision perspectives, including provisioning, managing, troubleshooting, and optimizing.
edff785e-e6c4-402b-88e1-cf46d251ab39.name: ACE: L4 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 4)

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:L4 certification requires a 5-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

skills.name: Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

d027fceb-dc95-4f92-8c50-532fd839b491.description: ACE:CVP Specialist is a 3-day course which will establish sound understanding and technical proficiency required to deploy, operate, and manage CVP for a Leaf-Spine network. This course explores how CVP is used as a turnkey solution for network-wide workload orchestration, workflow automation, and real-time visibility into network operations. In addition, you will examine advanced automation and optimization using CloudVision Studios.
d027fceb-dc95-4f92-8c50-532fd839b491.name: Arista CloudVision Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. Instructor-led and self-study options are available. After course completion, the ACE:CVP Specialist certification requires a 2-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom.

bb77d895-d949-42d9-9bfe-87652817c137.description: The ACE M&E Specialty certification recognizes individuals that have gone beyond our core ACE certifications and have attended training on M&E specific technologies. These include PTP, Multicast and parallel streaming networks within modern M&E organizations that are moving away from legacy approaches.
bb77d895-d949-42d9-9bfe-87652817c137.name: ACE Specialty - Media & Entertainment

badge_template_activities.title: Verification from an official Arista training partner is required to register and take an exam. After course completion, the ACE:M&E Specialist certification requires a 2-hour practical exam proctored via Zoom. Upon certification, the candidate will receive a certificate and digital badge for both ACE:L1 and ACE:M&E Specialist as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

5341aa93-f151-4eef-999f-75429afb8e03.description: ACE:Campus is a 5-day course designed to show how wired and wireless (WiFi) networks are deployed using Arista components and management tools.
5341aa93-f151-4eef-999f-75429afb8e03.name: Arista Campus Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of the ACE:Campus Specialist course, the candidate will receive a credential and digital badge as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

aca447a2-dd61-47b3-9b4c-8d67568d9f28.description: Converged Cloud Fabric (CCF) training is designed to give students an in-depth understanding of the industry’s most advanced SDN-enabled data center fabric. The course introduces students to an overview of SDN and Software-Defined Data Centers that are central to the design and operation of CCF. Students are guided through the course from concepts used in CCF, to the bringing up of a CCF POD, to building tenant-centric networks and activities associated with performing day-to-day Operations.
aca447a2-dd61-47b3-9b4c-8d67568d9f28.name: Converged Cloud Fabric (CCF) Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completion of the ACE: CCF Specialist course, the candidate will receive a credential and digital badge as verification of the knowledge and skills acquired through the training.

2320553e-5ad9-4bd4-ae1b-8fa084dbe502.description: The ACE Level 6 certification is a multi-faceted examination only. There is no required course. The examination requires the engineer to take a scenario that covers Data Center, Campus and External Connectivity and Automation topics then apply the design and architecture to solve the issues presented. The engineer is required to submit a full response to include proposed architecture and design and recommended configurations. The design is presented to a team of proctors representing a customer.
2320553e-5ad9-4bd4-ae1b-8fa084dbe502.name: ACE: L6 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 6)

badge_template_activities.title: 7+ Years Experience - Networking Lead, Architect and Practical RFP-based Design and Architecture Exam

skills.name: Open Shortest Path First (OSPF)v2 And OSPFv3

2c766b8f-afda-472a-bf67-32ca4d3fe548.description: The ACE Level 7 certification is a multi-faceted examination only. There is no required course. ACE:L7 is the only certification level that has a mandatory prerequisite: a current ACE:L6 certification. The examination requires the engineer to execute an advanced design and architecture solution. The exam addresses: Data Center Leaf-Spine, External Connectivity, Campus and Automation. Engineers are required to implement advanced configurations through EOS CLI, CloudVision and Automation Scripts.
2c766b8f-afda-472a-bf67-32ca4d3fe548.name: ACE: L7 (Arista Cloud Engineer: Level 7)

badge_template_activities.title: 7+ Years Experience - Networking Lead, Architect and Practical configuration, troubleshooting and automation Exam
